properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 14 at 2:50PM CST by NWS Green Bay WI
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Green Bay WI has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Michigan...Wisconsin...

Menominee River near Pembine affecting Menominee and Marinette
Counties.

.An ice jam will cause the river to fluctuate around flood stage for
the next few days.

The National Weather Service in Green Bay has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Menominee River near Pembine.
* From this afternoon until further notice.
* At 2:00 PM CST Friday the stage was 15.1 feet.
* Flood stage is 15.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring.
* Forecast...No forecast is available for this location.
* Impact...At 16.0 feet, During the winter season...An ice jam is
likely occurring. Flooding affects mainly lowland and forested
land adjacent to the river.
properties.instruction:
Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.

Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.

The next statement will be issued late tonight at 245 AM CST.
